settings.title: Foodie Snack Perks
settings.body: Recognize, reward and give thanks to your team with our 100% personalized snack box delivery program, filled with food and drink from Canadian brands! Perfect for WFH teams, virtual events and offices.

settings.title: Design + Development
settings.body: Our experienced team of curators will ask about your objectives and budget before creating a custom gifting proposal that is tailored to your needs. From the products to the packaging, we’ll create something that reflects your brand, goals and values.

settings.title: Sourcing + Production
settings.body: Our in-house procurement and design team sources premium products from small and underrepresented brands across the country, and can put your logo on trendy, high quality items that recipients will appreciate and remember.

settings.title: Packaging + Sustainability
settings.body: We offer a wide range of planet-friendly packaging. From fast turn around stock options to custom-printed mailer boxes and keepsake bags.

settings.title: Fulfillment + Warehousing
settings.body: We're capable of a lot more than just curating! We're a full scale fulfillment and logistics partner too. From shipping, receiving and warehousing to ghost fulfillment and 3PL services, we've got you covered.

settings.title: Software + Stores
settings.body: Ship, track and manage gifts all from your couch (or office chair). No more dusty supply closets or shipping boxes under your desk.

settings.title: Tired of searching for the perfect gift? We’ll make it easy for you.
1. Email a unique code to each recipient based on your budget. You only pay for what is redeemed!
2. Recipients order from the Snack Box Builder on foodiepages, and select the snacks and drinks they want delivered to their home.
Event Gifts
settings.body: No event is complete without a gift or keepsake to take home.

settings.title: Client Appreciation Gifts
settings.body: Show your appreciation with a branded and personalized gift.

settings.title: No wasted perks
settings.body: Recipients are emailed a unique discount code based on your budget. You only pay for treats that get redeemed!

settings.title: Something for everyone
settings.body:
Filter the snack catalog by Values
(ex. Women-Owned, Brands That Give Back), Dietary Preferences, and more.

settings.title: One-off or auto-recurring
settings.body: Treat the team to a one-off snack stash, or set up monthly or bimonthly shipments.

settings.title: Include company swag
settings.body: Include branded swag, from stickers to sweaters, to reinforce and build culture with each shipment.

settings.title: Explore our features
settings.body: No filler items or mediocre snacks here. Pick from a curated collection of goodies from Canada's top independent food & drink makers. We prioritize brands that are woman-owned, BIPOC-owned and environmentally sustainable.

settings.title: Get in touch!
settings.body: Each foodiepages snack box is filled with premium goods from diverse, independently-owned makers and brands across Canada.
